attributes.action: Donald Trump to make a state visit in Birmingham
attributes.additional_details: Birmingham is the second biggest city and one of the most diverse.
attributes.background: Donald Trump defied all of the odds and is now the president for the United States. Unlike London, Birmingham voted to leave and played a huge part in the Brexit vote.  Donald will save us from Brexit thanks to his trade deals.Leave means leave and Trump mean Trump. Lets MAKE BIRMINGHAM GREAT AGAIN!

rejection.details:
The UK Government isn’t responsible for making the final decision about the programme for a state visit. The Government does discuss the options for the programme with the visiting government. However, the final decision on whether they take up the Government’s suggestions would be for the visiting government to make. The UK Government can’t force a visiting government to include a particular visit in the programme. 
 
You could start a new petition urging the UK Government to encourage President Trump to visit Birmingham.
